/opt/cmake-3.21.0-linux-x86_64/bin/cmake -DCMAKE_BUILD_TYPE=Debug -DCMAKE_MAKE_PROGRAM=/usr/bin/make -DCMAKE_C_COMPILER=/usr/bin/gcc -DCMAKE_CXX_COMPILER=/usr/bin/g++ -G "CodeBlocks - Unix Makefiles" /tmp

  for policy details.  Use the cmake_policy command to set the policy and
  suppress this warning.
